<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">namespace </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm">llvm</a> &#123;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><Highlight kind="comment">/// FileOutputBuffer - This interface provides simple way to create an in-memory</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><Highlight kind="comment">/// buffer which will be written to a file. During the lifetime of these</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><Highlight kind="comment">/// objects, the content or existence of the specified file is undefined. That</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="comment">/// is, creating an OutputBuffer for a file may immediately remove the file.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="comment">/// If the FileOutputBuffer is committed, the target file&#39;s content will become</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the buffer content at the time of the commit.  If the FileOutputBuffer is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="comment">/// not committed, the file will be deleted in the FileOutputBuffer destructor.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fileoutputbuffer"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fileoutputbuffer/#a92df6484e65e47b575a10a4f2080ae1b">FileOutputBuffer</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">enum</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Set the &#39;x&#39; bit on the resulting file.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fileoutputbuffer/#af1b284b267d7f4e6bac7b2e2f5916543afe6cf01b015c486f72450c8dee965b43"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fileoutputbuffer/#af1b284b267d7f4e6bac7b2e2f5916543afe6cf01b015c486f72450c8dee965b43">F&#95;executable</a> = 1,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Don&#39;t use mmap and instead write an in-memory buffer to a file when this</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// buffer is closed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fileoutputbuffer/#af1b284b267d7f4e6bac7b2e2f5916543a689301246a0b57930b400d09c64c2efa"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fileoutputbuffer/#af1b284b267d7f4e6bac7b2e2f5916543a689301246a0b57930b400d09c64c2efa">F&#95;no&#95;mmap</a> = 2,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Factory method to create an OutputBuffer object which manages a read/write</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// buffer of the specified size. When committed, the buffer will be written</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// to the file at the specified path.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// When F&#95;modify is specified and \\p FilePath refers to an existing on-disk</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// file \\p Size may be set to -1, in which case the entire file is used.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Otherwise, the file shrinks or grows as necessary based on the value of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\p Size.  It is an error to specify F&#95;modify and Size=-1 if \\p FilePath</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// does not exist.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/expected">Expected&lt;std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;FileOutputBuffer&gt;</a>&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fileoutputbuffer/#a3a10ce8cad8fee5d6a4c55270866aa05">create</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> FilePath, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Flags = 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Returns path where file will show up if buffer is committed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fileoutputbuffer/#a8608f2b468c9ff9ff7a890c12dffd4f9"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fileoutputbuffer/#a8608f2b468c9ff9ff7a890c12dffd4f9">getPath</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fileoutputbuffer/#afa260e26c967de39c8006b90831d428d">FinalPath</a>; &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Flushes the content of the buffer to its file and deallocates the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// buffer.  If commit() is not called before this object&#39;s destructor</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// is called, the file is deleted in the destructor. The optional parameter</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// is used if it turns out you want the file size to be smaller than</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// initially requested.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fileoutputbuffer/#aafb077585b21cdc78ea9bdd1c0624228"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">virtual</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fileoutputbuffer/#aafb077585b21cdc78ea9bdd1c0624228">commit</a>() = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// If this object was previously committed, the destructor just deletes</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// this object.  If this object was not committed, the destructor</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// deallocates the buffer and the target file is never written.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fileoutputbuffer/#a4f000f4de53568b0618c9271ba71ce01"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">virtual</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fileoutputbuffer/#a4f000f4de53568b0618c9271ba71ce01">~FileOutputBuffer</a>() = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">default</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This removes the temporary file (unless it already was committed)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// but keeps the memory mapping alive.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fileoutputbuffer/#acec36e58ffe661130abcaec115178ee7"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">virtual</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fileoutputbuffer/#acec36e58ffe661130abcaec115178ee7">discard</a>() &#123;&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
